Title: The Oolong Slayer
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Gabe Liedman, Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Holt both get in trouble when they work on a serial killer case together in secret. The Vulture asks Amy and Rosa set up his birthday party. Boyle introduces Terry to a delicious new snack.
